changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wres.UnitConversion(from_unit, to_unit, factor) SELECT F.measurementunit_id, T.measurementunit_id, 1/35.3146662127 FROM wres.MeasurementUnit F CROSS JOIN wres.MeasurementUnit T WHERE F.unit_name = 'CFS' AND T.unit_name = 'CMS' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wres.UnitConversion UC WHERE UC.from_unit = F.measurementunit_id AND UC.to_unit = T.measurementunit_id );
changeSet.comment: All initial misc. unit conversions have been added to the database.
